subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles scored the first four goals of Game 4 of its Western Conference finals series against Chicago and took a three-games-to-one lead with a 5-2 home victory.
snippet: Los Angeles scored the first four goals of Game 4 of its Western Conference finals series against Chicago and took a three-games-to-one lead with a 5-2 home victory.
